column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On my road trip from San Francisco to the east coast
column2: my friend suggested that I must check out Lou Malnati's. I'm so glad I did. On my last day in Chicago
column4: it was a good way to end the week long vacation Chicago style. The deep dish pepperoni cheese pizza was amazing. Drinks were measured
column5: so I had to drink down 4 drinks (incl. a long island) in 1 hour though.
